amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit use of funds made available for California drought response or relief in contravention of implementation of the California Water Code.

action.text: Mr. Simpson raised a point of order against the Garamendi amendment (A082). Mr. Simpson stated that the Garamendi amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A082) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
